Veterinary Science.1: Meet requirements to apply to veterinary school.
Veterinary Science.2: Converse in a knowledgeable and professional manner with employers and colleagues.
Veterinary Science.3: Demonstrate knowledge of animal health in individual animals and species.
Veterinary Science.4: Demonstrate basic knowledge of the scientific method and impact of research in animal health and disease.
Veterinary Science.5: Demonstrate general skills in laboratory procedures as applied to veterinary science.
Veterinary Science.6: Demonstrate general understanding of the global impact of veterinary science on animal production and food.
